name: The Square Bros
description:
The Square Bros was a small game I made in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. It was made in Contruct 2, and I hope you like it!

NOTE:

sometimes the physics engine i was using sometimes broke during gameplay, if this happens just restart the level. And KEEP IN MIND THAT THIS IS MY FIRST EVER GAME WITH C2 SO PLS WITHHOLD THE NEGITIVITY. Thank you
